Name: chlorine dioxide production | chlorine dioxide | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production from sodium chlorate and chloride by R2 process with a process yield of 95%. The inventory is based on stoechiometric calculations. The emissions to air (0.2 wt% of raw material input) and water were estimated using mass balance. Treatment of the waste water in a internal waste water treatment plant was assumed (elimination efficiency of 90% for C).
